cards.name: Bulbasaur

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the opponent's Pokémon is now Poisoned.

cards.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

cards.name: Charizard

attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to Charizard.

cards.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

cards.name: Pikachu

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the opponent's Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.description: A mouse Pokémon. It can generate electric attacks from the electric pouches located in both of its cheeks.
